case.title: mutually beneficial relationship - young student or single mom - m4w - 32 (nyc)
case.text:
Respectful gentleman hopes to meet a young, pretty female college or grad student for rewarding friendship. Please be intelligent, pretty and caring and we should get along together fine. A pic would be most appreciated. I am not a pic collector and will treat you with the utmost respect, i only ask that you do likewise.
asian , spanish , light skin hispanic , white
